newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi beheads Pakistani for drugs smuggling.
newsitem.headline: Saudi beheads Pakistani for drugs smuggling.

text.p: Saudi Arabia on Friday publicly beheaded a Pakistani man for smuggling heroin into the kingdom, the official Saudi Press Agency (SPA) said.
The conservative kingdom has executed at least 68 convicted criminals so far this year compared with the same number in all of 1996.
An Interior Ministry statement carried by SPA said the man was beheaded by the sword in the capital Riyadh after being convicted of smuggling an unspecified quantity of the drug.
Saudi Arabia enforces Islamic sharia law by publicly beheading convicted murderers, rapists, drug traffickers and other criminals.
